title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect information in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 regarding custom cookie name and URL rewriting
description: The bug report mentions an issue with the information mentioned in Servlet 3.0 specification chapter 7.1.1. The specification states that a custom cookie name should be used for URL rewriting, but in the current trunk, the default 'jsessionid' cookie name is used instead. The bug report includes a war file that can be used to reproduce the issue.
OB: When deploying the provided 'cookiename.war' file and accessing 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/', the URL does not contain the custom cookie name as expected.
EB: The URL should contain the custom cookie name instead of the default 'jsessionid'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Deploy the provided 'cookiename.war' file.
2. Access 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/'.
